channel.title: Dragon Platebody (317 Delta Source)
channel.description: ok i go ingame and equip the dpb and it equips to the right hand and not the chest how can i change this.

item.title: Dragon Platebody (317 Delta Source)
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

any idea what they should be

here is current:

		if(i == 10000)  // change this if you need to "item number"
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option
class8.anInt174 = 10069; //Model ID
class8.anInt181 = 1330; //zoom increase will make it smaller
class8.anInt190 = 310; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you
class8.anInt198 = 1800; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right
class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up
class8.anInt165 = 10014;//male wearing
class8.anInt200 = 10014;//female wearing
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.aString170 = "Dragon Platebody";//Name of the new item
class8.aByteArray178 = "You are a true DragonSlayer".getBytes();//examine info
}

item.title: Dragon Platebody (317 Delta Source)
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

Go server side open item.java and search for platebody, and add the model id at the end…

example :public static int platebody[] = {577,2896,2906,2916,2926};

and add ur item : public static int platebody[] = {577,2896,2906,2916,2926,13665};

Read full topic
